item.title: Grand Café de Tropen, Amsterdam, Netherlands
item.description:
Grand Café de Tropen, Amsterdam, Netherlands

To be frank, Amsterdam's Koninklijk Instituut voor de Tropen, more informally known as the Royal Tropical Institute, is not the first place you'd think of for a lunch of pulled chicken marinated in hoi-sin and star anise. The stately Dutch Gothic Revival pile was designed by J.J.

item.title: Apple Challenges Government Demand To Crack Drug Dealer's iPhone In New York
item.description:
Apple Challenges Government Demand To Crack Drug Dealer's iPhone In New York

Apple has formally challenged the U.S. Department of Justice over another locked iPhone and the encrypted information it contains. Owned by an accused methamphetamine distributor in Brooklyn, the iPhone 5s is believed to contain evidence of a drug conspiracy, investigators said. The government claims that its technicians can't penetrate the locked iPhone and require Apple's help to get inside.

item.title: From Science Fiction to Reality: The Evolution of Artificial Intelligence
item.description:
From Science Fiction to Reality: The Evolution of Artificial Intelligence

What was once just a figment of the imagination of some our most famous science fiction writers, artificial intelligence (AI) is taking root in our everyday lives. We're still a few years away from having robots at our beck and call, but AI has already had a profound impact in more subtle ways.
